scripts.pbuild:devmeta: yarn run dotenv -e .env.devmeta generate-robotstxt public/robots.txt && yarn run dotenv -e .env.devmeta babel-node src/sitemapGenerator.js
scripts.pbuild:testnet: yarn run dotenv -e .env.testnet generate-robotstxt public/robots.txt && yarn run dotenv -e .env.testnet babel-node src/sitemapGenerator.js
scripts.pbuild:mainnet: yarn run dotenv -e .env.production generate-robotstxt public/robots.txt && yarn run dotenv -e .env.production babel-node src/sitemapGenerator.js
scripts.pbuild:mainnet2: yarn run dotenv -e .env.mainnet2 generate-robotstxt public/robots.txt && yarn run dotenv -e .env.mainnet2 babel-node src/sitemapGenerator.js
scripts.build: echo "Please use build:testnet or build:mainnet " && exit 1
scripts.build:devmeta: CI=false && yarn run pbuild:devmeta && dotenv -e .env.devmeta react-app-rewired build && yarn postbuild
scripts.build:testnet: CI=false && yarn run pbuild:testnet && dotenv -e .env.testnet react-app-rewired build && yarn postbuild
scripts.build:mainnet: CI=false && yarn run pbuild:mainnet && dotenv -e .env.production react-app-rewired build && yarn postbuild
scripts.build:mainnet2: CI=false && yarn run pbuild:mainnet2 && dotenv -e .env.mainnet2 react-app-rewired build && yarn postbuild
